1: -module(xep_0352_csi_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
    4: 
    5: -compile([export_all]).
    6: 
    7: -define(CSI_BUFFER_MAX, 10).
    8: 
    9: all() ->
   10:     [{group, basic}].
   11: 
   12: 
   13: groups() ->
   14:     [{basic,
   15:       [parallel, shuffle],
   16:       all_tests()
   17:      }].
   18: 
   19: all_tests() ->
   20:     [
   21:      server_announces_csi,
   22:      alice_is_inactive_and_no_stanza_arrived,
   23:      alice_gets_msgs_after_activate,
   24:      alice_gets_msgs_after_activate_in_order,
   25:      alice_gets_message_after_buffer_overflow,
   26:      bob_gets_msgs_from_inactive_alice,
   27:      alice_is_inactive_but_sends_sm_req_and_recives_ack
   28:     ].
   29: 
   30: suite() ->
   31:     escalus:suite().
   32: 
   33: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   34:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
   35:     dynamic_modules:start(Domain, mod_csi, [{buffer_max, ?CSI_BUFFER_MAX}]),
   36:     [{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd}} | escalus:init_per_suite(Config)].
   37: 
   38: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   39:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
   40:     dynamic_modules:stop(Domain, mod_csi),
   41:     escalus_fresh:clean(),
   42:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   43: 
   44: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
   45:     escalus_users:update_userspec(Config, alice, stream_management, true).
   46: 
   47: end_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
   48:     Config.
   49: 
   50: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   51:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   52: 
   53: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   54:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   55: 
   56: server_announces_csi(Config) ->
   57:     NewConfig = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{alice, 1}]),
   58:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(NewConfig, alice),
   59:     Steps = [start_stream,
   60:              stream_features,
   61:              maybe_use_ssl,
   62:              maybe_use_compression,
   63:              authenticate,
   64:              bind,
   65:              session],
   66:     {ok, _Client, _Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, Steps),
   67:     true = proplists:get_value(client_state_indication, Features).
   68: 
   69: alice_is_inactive_and_no_stanza_arrived(Config) ->
   70:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   71:         given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, 1),
   72: 
   73:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
   74:     end).
   75: 
   76: alice_gets_msgs_after_activate(Config) ->
   77:     alice_gets_msgs_after_activate(Config, 1).
   78: 
   79: alice_gets_msgs_after_activate_in_order(Config) ->
   80:     alice_gets_msgs_after_activate(Config, 3).
   81: 
   82: alice_gets_msgs_after_activate(Config, N) ->
   83:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   84:         %%Given
   85:         Msgs = given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, N),
   86: 
   87:         %%When client becomes active again
   88:         escalus:send(Alice, csi_stanza(<<"active">>)),
   89: 
   90:         then_client_receives_message(Alice, Msgs)
   91:     end).
   92: 
   93: alice_gets_message_after_buffer_overflow(Config) ->
   94:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   95:         Msgs = given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, ?CSI_BUFFER_MAX+5),
   96: 
   97:         {Flushed, Awaiting} = lists:split(?CSI_BUFFER_MAX+1, Msgs),
   98: 
   99:         then_client_receives_message(Alice, Flushed),
  100:         %% and no other stanza
  101:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice),
  102:         %% Alice activates
  103:         escalus:send(Alice, csi_stanza(<<"active">>)),
  104:         %% ands gets remaining stanzas
  105:         then_client_receives_message(Alice, Awaiting)
  106:     end).
  107: 
  108: 
  109: 
  110: bob_gets_msgs_from_inactive_alice(Config) ->
  111:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  112:         given_client_is_inactive_but_sends_messages(Alice, Bob, 1),
  113: 
  114:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob))
  115:     end).
  116: 
  117: alice_is_inactive_but_sends_sm_req_and_recives_ack(Config) ->
  118:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice,1}], fun(Alice) ->
  119:         given_client_is_inactive(Alice),
  120: 
  121:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_request()),
  122: 
  123:         escalus:assert(is_sm_ack, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  124: 
  125:     end).
  126: 
  127: given_client_is_inactive_but_sends_messages(Alice, Bob, N) ->
  128:     %%Given
  129:     MsgsToAlice = given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, N),
  130: 
  131:     MsgsToBob = gen_msgs(<<"Hi, Bob">>, N),
  132:     send_msgs(Alice, Bob, MsgsToBob),
  133:     timer:sleep(1),
  134:     {MsgsToAlice, MsgsToBob}.
  135: 
  136: 
  137: then_client_receives_message(Alice, Msgs) ->
  138:     [escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [Msg], escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)) ||
  139:      Msg <- Msgs].
  140: 
  141: 
  142: given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, N) ->
  143:     %%Given
  144:     given_client_is_inactive(Alice),
  145: 
  146:     timer:sleep(1000),
  147: 
  148:     %%When
  149:     Msgs = gen_msgs(<<"Hi, Alice">>, N),
  150:     send_msgs(Bob, Alice, Msgs),
  151:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  152:     Msgs.
  153: 
  154: send_msgs(From, To, Msgs) ->
  155:     [escalus:send(From, escalus_stanza:chat_to(To, Msg)) ||
  156:      Msg <- Msgs].
  157: 
  158: 
  159: gen_msgs(Prefix, N) ->
  160:     [<<Prefix/binary, (integer_to_binary(I))/binary>> || I <- lists:seq(1, N)].
  161: 
  162: given_client_is_inactive(Alice) ->
  163:     escalus:send(Alice, csi_stanza(<<"inactive">>)).
  164: 
  165: 
  166: csi_stanza(Name) ->
  167:     #xmlel{name = Name,
  168:            attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"urn:xmpp:csi:0">>}]}.
  169:
